name: Octopus LCD Game
description:
Can you collect all gold from the pirate's chest? Avoid getting eaten by the octopus and bring all gold to the surface. Use Left and Right arrow keys or press the on-screen Left and Right buttons. Start a game by pressing 'Game A' or 'Game B'.

Game features:
• Retro gameplay true to the original.
• Easy to learn.
• Hard to master.
• Hi-score and bonuses.
